WFC 70: Data Literacy for Wildlife Biologist 1 Welcome to WFC 70

WFC 70: Data Literacy for Wildlife Biologist Rob Furrow 2025-05-02 1 Welcome to WFC 70 The purpose of WFC 70 is to introduce and strength your data literacy skills. In this course, you will working with data sets, R and R Studio and understanding what data literacy is. This website aims to be a place where we demonstrate solutions to common mistakes, provide more practice, and provide resources to improve your R and data literacy skills.
2 Getting Started 2.1 Installing R and R Studio

2 Getting Started 2.1 Installing R and R Studio A program you will hopefully become familiar with is R and R Studio. Lecture and lab discusses the differences between these two. R is the language you are using to create the graphs. R Studio is where you input the code. One way to think about it is that R Studio is the kitchen and R represents all your ingredients.
